text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct version 2021
    CodeDisplay
    1481000119100Diabetes mellitus type 2 without retinopathy (disorder)
    313436004Type II diabetes mellitus without complication (disorder)
    313435000Type I diabetes mellitus without complication (disorder)
    111552007Diabetes mellitus without complication (disorder)
  • Include these codes as defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/sid/icd-10-cm version 2022
    CodeDisplay
    E13.9Other specified diabetes mellitus without complications
    E10.9Type 1 diabetes mellitus without complications
    E11.9Type 2 diabetes mellitus without complications

name: DiabetesUncomplicated
title: Diabetes (Uncomplicated)
description: SNOMED and ICD10 codes for diabetes (uncomplicated)

concept.display: Type II diabetes mellitus without complication (disorder)
